sentences.sContent: But in the course of history, we settled beginning in the sixteenth and seventeenth century, down into just two patterns: what we call the major pattern and the minor pattern.
sentences.sContent_eng: But in the course of history, we settled beginning in the sixteenth and seventeenth century, down into just two patterns: what we call the major pattern and the minor pattern.
sentences.sCn: 但在历史的发展过程中,在十六到十七世纪期间,人们最终确定了下列两种模式,我们称之为大调模式和小调模式

words.tran: （与 the 连用）第六的，第六个的；六分之一的
第六十的；六十分之一的
月的第六日，（与the连用的）第六个；六分之一

trans.tranOther: one of 16 equal parts of something

trans.tranCn: 第十六的；十六分之一的
